Articles.Content: One think I've noticed in the 0.2 settings is an option to toggle mutli-joints. is there any clarification on what these are anywhere?
I haven`t found any of the said joint options in the settings... can someone explain where to find them???
Well, I can't answer your question @Mikki, but @mattihase, it's the old joint system that was causing most of the wobbly rocket issues. Use the Enhanced Joint system to nullify most wobbly issues.

On 12/21/2023 at 3:52 PM, Mikki said:

I haven`t found any of the said joint options in the settings... can someone explain where to find them???

it's only visible in the Main Menu's Settings page, under Gameplay. There are 3 new options, under the category of "Physx Joints":

1. Enhanced Joints System toggled off/on

2. Enhanced Joints Mode – heaviest, root, or grandparent

3. Multi-Joint System toggled off/on

The tooltip for Enhanced Joints System says that when you have it enabled, it recommends turning off Multi-Joint System due to performance.

It seems like Enhanced Joints System is basically enabling autostrut for all parts (which I think they said is a temporary band-aid, not the long-term solution), while Multi-Joint System is specifically aimed at making vertical stacks more structurally sound
